website_summaries.verdict: While it's a reasonably priced portable model well-suited for long run time for items that don't draw a lot of power, if you need it fast and need to power larger appliances, you may be out of luck.
pros: A middle-of-the-road generator at a mid-level price
Offers 5,500 running watts and impressive 15 hours run time
Earns praise for the convenient LED control panel that that's easy to read
cons: May take up to 4 weeks for delivery – a deal-breaker for consumers who need a generator in a pinch
Some issues with it reliably running  refrigerators, which is a common need in most emergency situations

customer_reviews.title: Another great CAT product!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my dad. He’s happy. I hope he doesn’t have to use it. It is worth the price. Runs quiet enough.
customer_reviews.author: CJamison

customer_reviews.title: LOW POWER!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this gen because it is made by Cat and think it will be quality. But factory direct shipping i guess means made in China. I was powering a few circ saws, drills and lights all less than 23 amps like the data plate says but the power was poor. Had my electrician look at the gen and tells that the machine only good for 4900 watts. Now im at the jobsite without enough power. There should be law against this.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: ... - we won't have to worry about food going bad, etc
customer_reviews.text: Next time we lose power for several days - we won't have to worry about food going bad, etc. Haven't tried it out yet, but will do so after the holidays and might update then.
customer_reviews.author: galaraf

customer_reviews.title: CAT price, not CAT quality
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with the casting of motor, divets all over. A window unit keeps tripping 20 amp gfci outlets, the a.c unit is 4.5 amp, 515 watts. CAT support said i needed 30 amp cord converter to solve. Will not run anything of substance without 30 amp breaker cord/ converter. This generator does not come with cord. Unlike briggs&stratton storm surge 6250. The rp5500 ran ok for the first 2 nights, but now on night 3 at 30hrs the voltage output has dropped from 240v to ~200v. Again not impressed with this generator but still in the midst of hurricane florence in eastern NC. Big time let down by CAT rp5500. I dont recommend, especially without 30 amp cord
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: really reliable
customer_reviews.text: purchased 2017, hooked up a transfer switch to home this rp7500E generator hold everything in our home for ours except the central air, we have been without power for hours in Louisville and it does what it supposed to do, and it is not loud as to where it disturbs our neighbors, just remember to use gas stabilizer while storing generator and start once a month if possible
customer_reviews.author: mr.Q

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Started up half pull! Runs very smooth powered up a few tools didn’t even strain motor!
customer_reviews.author: Nico Schoenfuss

customer_reviews.title: Worked great throughout Hurricane Florence
customer_reviews.text: Worked continuously for 4 straight days during Hurricane Florence, mostly in pouring rain. Had a small plastic mat ratchet strapped to the top to help with the rain. Not a single problem. It ran a commercial refrigerator, house lights, ceiling fans, window a/c unit and electric skillet. We alternated the fridge with a deep freezer. After the storm, cleaned it, changed the oil and ran the gas out of it. Just pulled it out of the shed almost a year later because of another possible storm. Poured some fresh gas in it and it started on the second pull.
customer_reviews.author: Magret67

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: Used both with 30 amp and without. No issues with either. With 30 amp ran my well pump window ac tv internet separate fridge and freezer plus a few plugs and a fan without issue. Bought from Lowe’s got a great price. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: Worse 2 units ive ever had. Cant even run a refrigerator by itself. Like what is it even good for?!?!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Bendit

customer_reviews.title: Cat RP5500 is a powerful generator
customer_reviews.text: Cat RP5500 is a powerful generator with 15hours of power supply ability. It price is also economical. It work good , no complain as of now. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: fanish

customer_reviews.title: noiseless and has a tank capacity of 14 gallons which makes it the best in class product
customer_reviews.text: The 5500 watt machine is a beast with a total run time up to 14 hours. It comes with 5 outlets which gives the ease of access to connect multiple appliances. The engine is very powerful, noiseless and has a tank capacity of 14 gallons which makes it the best in class product. by palanichamy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Cat RP5500 5500 Running Watts and 6875 Starting Watts Gas powered Portable Generator 490-6489
product_meta.description:
Style:StandardThe small but sturdy 490-6489 Rp5500 portable generator includes the Cat 300 cc, OHV engine that has been designed for power, durability & quiet operation; it comes with a heavy-duty all-steel construction, never-flat rubber wheels & a double folding handle.

All Cat generators are easy to set up & operate with simple, intuitive controls & an led-lit control panel which makes it easy to operate even in the dark. This 490-6489 Cat generator comes with a 36 month limited warranty when product is registered within 30 days & a 24/7/365 Toll free & online support from caterpillar. 

The Cat 490-6489 generator includes enhanced safety features such as recessed sockets with waterproof covers. This compact, affordable portable generator 490-6489 will generate 5500 running / 6875 starting which is enough power to keep the critical items you need running. Note for California residents: this 490-6489 is not carb-compliant. Units sold to California must be carb-compliant.
feature_bullets: Powers You For Up To 15 Hours
Assembly Tools, Engine Oil and Funnel Included - Just Add Gas
Easy to Use, Single Side Operation
Padded Double Hinged Handle and Solid Rubber Wheels
3-Year Limited Warranty for Parts and Service for Full Term

specifications.Domestic Shipping: This item is available for shipping in the U.S. except for California and to select countries outside the U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
